EmailTemplate.description: Notification after Regional Territory Head/ Product Makerketing VP Approves the BX009
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: Approval by Regional Head/ Marketing VP
EmailTemplate.subject: BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has been Approved by Regional Territory Head/ Marketing VP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, The BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has been Approved by Regional Territory Head/ Marketing VP. The BX009 can be accessed via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}.
Thanks.
